thread.title: Witness of halfway house execution of person Obama commuted arrested
thread.title_full: Witness of halfway house execution of person Obama commuted arrested

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Witness of halfway house execution of person Obama commuted arrested
text: During an interview the following day, the suspect explained to Flint police he was in the halfway house when the fatal shooting occurred and "he acquired the Makarov 9mm pistol from a man who stole the gun from a home," according to the complaint.
